could you generate 5 prompts to generate enemy avatars with help of stable diffusion stable diffusion allows for the generation of images based on textual prompts here are five prompts to generate enemy avatars that are inspired by the lord of the rings theme  1 a menacing nazgûl wearing a dark hooded cloak and wielding a long sinister sword  2 a hulking troll with rough stonelike skin and large tusks wielding a massive club  3 a cunning goblin with green scaly skin pointy ears and sharp teeth armed with a jagged dagger  4 a twisted orc with a muscular build red eyes and battle scars holding a crude axe  5 a fearsome urukhai with dark thick skin a prominent brow ridge and carrying a large spiked mace отлично скармливать deliberate заваривать чай ждать результат a menacing nazgûl
